mapper.sql: a.invocie_id AS "invocieId", a.apply_user_id AS "applyUserId", a.apply_user_name AS "applyUserName", a.created_time AS "createdTime", a.cust_addr AS "custAddr", a.cust_name AS "custName", a.cust_tel AS "custTel", a.ems_company AS "emsCompany", a.ems_company_name AS "emsCompanyName", a.ems_nbr AS "emsNbr", a.ems_price AS "emsPrice", a.invocie_nbr AS "invocieNbr", a.invocie_play_price AS "invociePlayPrice", a.invocie_price AS "invociePrice", a.invocie_state AS "invocieState", a.invocie_title AS "invocieTitle", a.invocie_type AS "invocieType", a.main_order_id AS "mainOrderId", a.remark AS "remark", a.return_ems_time AS "returnEmsTime", a.invocie_type_two AS "invocieTypeTwo", a.invocie_type_three AS "invocieTypeThree", a.invocie_bank AS "invocieBank", a.download_addr AS "downloadAddr"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_invocie( invocie_id, apply_user_id, apply_user_name, created_time, cust_addr, cust_name, cust_tel, ems_company, ems_company_name, ems_nbr, ems_price, invocie_nbr, invocie_play_price, invocie_price, invocie_state, invocie_title, invocie_type, main_order_id, remark, return_ems_time, invocie_type_two, invocie_type_three, invocie_bank, download_addr ) VALUES ( #{invocieId}, #{applyUserId}, #{applyUserName}, #{createdTime}, #{custAddr}, #{custName}, #{custTel}, #{emsCompany}, #{emsCompanyName}, #{emsNbr}, #{emsPrice}, #{invocieNbr}, #{invociePlayPrice}, #{invociePrice}, #{invocieState}, #{invocieTitle}, #{invocieType}, #{mainOrderId}, #{remark}, #{returnEmsTime}, #{invocieTypeTwo}, #{invocieTypeThree}, #{invocieBank}, #{downloadAddr} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_invocie SET invocie_id = #{invocieId}, apply_user_id = #{applyUserId}, apply_user_name = #{applyUserName}, created_time = #{createdTime}, cust_addr = #{custAddr}, cust_name = #{custName}, cust_tel = #{custTel}, ems_company = #{emsCompany}, ems_company_name = #{emsCompanyName}, ems_nbr = #{emsNbr}, ems_price = #{emsPrice}, invocie_nbr = #{invocieNbr}, invocie_play_price = #{invociePlayPrice}, invocie_price = #{invociePrice}, invocie_state = #{invocieState}, invocie_title = #{invocieTitle}, invocie_type = #{invocieType}, main_order_id = #{mainOrderId}, remark = #{remark}, return_ems_time = #{returnEmsTime}, invocie_type_two = #{invocieTypeTwo}, invocie_type_three = #{invocieTypeThree}, invocie_bank = #{invocieBank}, download_addr = #{downloadAddr} WHERE id = #{id}
